name: assoc_arrow1
title: Spaces around `=>`
comment: Applies to named associations, aggregates, case arms.

name: cmt_whole_01_v2
title: Whole-line comment spacing: `--  text` (GNAT style)
comment: Ensures whole-line comments have exactly 2 spaces after -- when they have 0-1 spaces. Preserves comments with 2+ spaces. GNAT -gnatyy requirement.

name: comment_eol1_v2
title: EOL comment spacing: one before --, one after
comment: Ensures inline comments have at least 1 space before and after --. Only fixes missing space after --. GNAT -gnatyy requirement.

name: separator_lines
title: Fix separator line comments to have 2 spaces
comment: Ensures separator lines like '-- ======' have 2 spaces after --. GNAT -gnatyy requirement.

name: comma_space1
title: Comma spacing
comment: No space before comma; exactly one space after (unless before `)` or EOL).

name: decl_colon01
title: Declaration colon spacing: `Name : Type`
comment: Excludes assignments (`:=`) and comment lines (--); preserves indentation; avoids strings with even-quote heuristic.

name: eof_newline1
title: Ensure final newline at EOF
comment: Guarantee exactly one newline at end of file.

name: paren_l_sp01
title: No space after `(`
comment: Trim spaces right after opening parenthesis.

name: paren_r_sp01
title: No space before `)`
comment: Trim spaces right before closing parenthesis.

name: semi_space01
title: No space before `;`
comment: Remove any whitespace immediately before semicolons.

name: ws_trail_sp1
title: Trim trailing whitespace
comment: Remove spaces/tabs at end of each line.
